info.modalContent:
Clients represent your customers or business units in Flipika, allowing you to organize and manage your Google Ads reporting by client.

With clients, you can:
• Associate each client with a specific Google Ads account
• Upload custom logos for branded reports
• Set default templates and themes for automatic application
• Store contact information to automatically address reports to the client's email
• Organize your reports by client for easy access

Clients help you streamline your workflow and ensure consistent, professional reporting for each customer.
